description.en: Large-scale porcelain floor tiling for a corporate office in Docklands. Self-levelled substrate across 400+ sqm, 600x1200 stone-look tiles in a straight-lay pattern, anti-slip finish, stainless-steel expansion joint trims, and colour-matched grouting.
description.zh: Docklands写字楼大面积瓷质砖地面铺贴。400+平方米自流平基底、600x1200仿石砖直铺、防滑处理、不锈钢伸缩缝收边条，以及配色填缝。
